value: Reason to Fight
Past tap battles get an encore!
Select up to four skills to inherit.

Inheriting Skills:
An ally can inherit up to four
skills at a time from another
ally. You'll lose the ally
donating any skills.

Inherited skills are added to
the recipient's skill list. They
are learned like any other skill
but require 1.5x the usual SP.

Using Combat Manuals 2:
The following will not be included
in the Combat Manual:
・ Levels and EXP
・ Skills that were learned
・ Skills that were inherited or
refined
・ The number of merges
・ Blessings conferred
・ Dragonflowers used
A Skill Seals
B Skill Seals
C Skill Seals
Exclusive Seals
Sacred Seals with an A Skill's effect.
Sacred Seals with a B Skill's effect.
Sacred Seals with a C Skill's effect.
Sacred Seals with an exclusive effect.
Battle Ballot
Use Battle Ballots and Battle Flags to vote.

$aPoints × $a0!

Battles:
If you have one or more Battle
Ballots, you can participate in
a Voting Gauntlet battle.

Battle Ballots will be restored
once per hour.

Attack Power Selection:
After you win a battle, you can
select how many Battle Ballots
and Battle Flags to use.

The number of Flags used will
be boosted by the number of
Ballots cast (e.g., using 2 Ballots
will consume 2× Flags).
